definition: see 唯命是從|唯命是从[wei2 ming4 shi4 cong2]
-ism/only
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
smile (archaic)
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow

sentences.english: Her father dictated and her mother obeyed.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲发号施令，她母亲惟命是听。

definition: minister not afraid to give forthright criticism
to be fawningly submissive (idiom)
humble expression for generous donation
to detest sth or sb to the utmost extreme (idiom)
to defect/to be disloyal
to win without a fight (idiom)
official in feudal court/subject
to counsel a superior in tears indicating absolute sincerity
has eyes but can't see (idiom); unable or unwilling to see the importance of sth/blind (to sth great)
if it's plowing, ask the laborer (idiom); when managing a matter, consult the appropriate specialist
to praise sb to his face
Mr Zhu Yun breaks the railing (idiom); to challenge and admonish boldly
an incompetent man clings to a good position (idiom)
butchering one another as fish and flesh (idiom); killing one another/internecine strife
see 矯枉過正|矫枉过正[jiao3 wang3 guo4 zheng4]
to sit and await success or failure (idiom); to wait to see the outcome of a fight before taking sides/to sit on the fence
